page_content: The page discusses financial support for events that have economic significance and national impact in the Canton of Bern.
The page provides statistics on educational qualifications at the secondary and tertiary levels.
The page discusses a brochure aimed at helping young people and their teachers navigate the career choice process.
The page provides various publications related to aging policy in the Canton of Bern.
The page discusses flexible work arrangements supported by the Canton of Bern, including the use of video and teleconferencing software.
The page profiles Daniel Rossel, who works on traffic technology and safety, and discusses his involvement in digitalization projects.
